body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for contacting our customer service. My name is Bruce Butler and I represent Speedy Motors, how may I assist you today? May I have your name please?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Marilyn. Could you please provide me with your phone number?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, it's five five five, two three four, nine eight seven six.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, and could you also share your email address with me?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Perfect, thank you for sharing that information with me, Marilyn. Now, how can I assist you further with your inquiry today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I'm having an issue with the shipping of my recent car purchase.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I understand your frustration, Marilyn. Let me look into the matter for you. Thank you for your patience and cooperation.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you again for reaching out, Marilyn. Have a great day, and feel free to contact us if you need any further assistance. Goodbye.
